SELECT USER_SEQ AS userSeq , MACADDRESS AS macAddress , WATT AS watt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS regDate , GROUP_CONCAT( WATT SEPARATOR ';' ) AS wattList , GROUP_CONCAT( EVENT_TYPE SEPARATOR ';' ) AS eventList FROM TBL_LOG_INFO

SELECT USER_SEQ AS userSeq , MACADDRESS AS macAddress , SUM(WATT) AS watt , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m') AS regDate FROM TBL_LOG_INFO
DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{param.beforeday},'%Y%m%d'),'%Y-%m') and DATE_FORMAT(REG_DATE,'%Y-%m') < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(#{param.afterday},'%Y%m%d'),interval 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m')
AND USER_SEQ = CAST(#{param.searchValue} AS INT)
AND MACADDRESS = #{param.searchValue}
